name: Nature Recordings
description: Recordings of natural phenomena such as waterfalls, ocean waves, and storms, as well as Animal Sounds.

children.name: Animal Sounds
children.description: Recordings which are done in order to capture sounds produced by animals.

children.name: Birdsong
children.description: Recordings of bird vocalizations often distinguished into the shorter bird call and longer, more complex birdsong.

children.name: Insect Sounds
children.description: Recordings that capture the sounds produced by insects.

children.name: Whale Song
children.description: Among the most complex animal vocalizations on Earth, the songs of baleen whales are usually limited to the mating and migratory seasons of these animals.

name: Radio Broadcast Recordings
description: Recordings of transmissions sent by radio waves, used for sending communications to a wide audience.
